testcase.name: E2E - Akcja wybrania opcji select Wybieranie wszystkich opcji

failure.message:
`cy.select()` failed because this element is detached from the DOM.
`<select id="selectProductSort" class="selectProductSort form-control">...</select>`
Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them.
The previous command that ran was:
> `cy.wrap()`
This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command.
Common situations why this happens: - Your JS framework re-rendered asynchronously - Your app code reacted to an event firing and removed the element
You typically need to re-query for the element or add 'guards' which delay Cypress from running new commands.
https://on.cypress.io/element-has-detached-from-dom
